posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 快速开始创建一篇新博客1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing 启动本地服务器1$ hexo server More info: Server 生成静态文件1$ hexo generate More info: Generating 部署到远端1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
